title: Naughty Nights in the Millionaire's Mansion
description: Dynamic and drop-dead gorgeous, Sydney millionaire Mitch Stuart will be president of his family's empire in just two weeks—and he won't allow himself any distractions…. Enter Vanessa Craig!Vanessa is working hard to keep her business afloat, although she can't help but care more about the pets in her store than pennies in the bank.Mitch steps in to help her in the only way he knows—financially. But Vanessa's bewitching body threatens his hard-and-fast corporate never mix business with pleasure….
author: Robyn Grady
